name: CCB Spread
preparation: Combine Dip Mix and cream cheese and serve.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowlâ€”use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.
